snippet: A presidential adviser criticized Aung San Suu Kyi for the way she handled her first foreign trip as a member of Parliament, signaling possible strains in her relationship with Myanmar’s leader.
abstract: U Nay Zin Latt, adviser to Myanmar Pres Thein Sein, publicly criticizes Aung San Suu Kyi for the way she handled her first foreign trip as a member of Parliament, signaling a possible rift between the country's political reformers.
lead_paragraph: A presidential adviser criticized Aung San Suu Kyi for the way she handled her first foreign trip as a member of Parliament, signaling possible strains in her relationship with Myanmar’s leader.

headline.seo: Myanmar Leader May Be at Odds With Aung San Suu Kyi
headline.main: Hints of a Rift Between Myanmar’s Political Reformers
headline.print_headline: Hints of a Rift Between Myanmar’s Political Reformers
